calling the method to draw the camera frustum to a specified PGraphics3D
draw() - クラス のメソッドnet.unitedfield.processinglue.PglueDisplay
This method is called in the parent 3D PApplet and draws the content of the PApplet.
draw(PGraphics3D) - クラス のメソッドnet.unitedfield.processinglue.PglueDisplay
This method is called in the parent 3D PApplet using PglueCapture(a virtual camera).
draw() - クラス のメソッドnet.unitedfield.processinglue.PglueFloor
drawing the grid which center is (0,0,0).
draw(PGraphics3D) - クラス のメソッドnet.unitedfield.processinglue.PglueFloor
drawing the grid to a specified PGraphics3D
draw(PGraphics3D) - クラス のメソッドnet.unitedfield.processinglue.PglueFrustum
draw the frustum to a specified PGraphics3D
drawShape(PGraphics3D) - クラス のメソッドnet.unitedfield.processinglue.PglueDisplay
This draws the content as a texture of a PShape

post() - クラス のメソッドnet.unitedfield.processinglue.PglueDisplay
This method is registered to the content PApplet, and called after draw() in the content PApplet to copy the drawn content.
